message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $10,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay. I'm interested in the product, but I can only offer $7,500 at this time.
Bob, I understand your position, but $7,500 is too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $9,000?
Alice, I'm still not quite there at $9,000.  I'm willing to go up to $8,500.  Let's see if we can make this work.
